Package: com.github.dfrommi.pandoc.convert

[Groovy] Class JsonToPandocTypeConverter

    • com.github.dfrommi.pandoc.convert.JsonToPandocTypeConverter
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      JsonTypeConverter

      class JsonToPandocTypeConverter
extends java.lang.Object

      Converter between json structure and pandoc type objects.
